Table.Name: Detection
Table.Description: Contains single epoch photometry of individual detections from a single exposure

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Unique object identifier.

Column.Name: uniquePspsP2id
Column.Description: Unique internal PSPS detection identifier.

Column.Name: detectID
Column.Description: Unique detection identifier.

Column.Name: ippObjID
Column.Description: IPP internal object identifier.

Column.Name: ippDetectID
Column.Description: IPP internal detection identifier.

Column.Name: filterID
Column.Description: Filter identifier. Details in the Filter table.

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: Survey identifier. Details in the Survey table.

Column.Name: imageID
Column.Description: Unique image identifier. Constructed as (100 * frameID + ccdID).

Column.Name: randomDetID
Column.Description: Random value drawn from the interval between zero and one.

Column.Name: dvoRegionID
Column.Description: Internal DVO region identifier.

Column.Name: obsTime
Column.Description: Modified Julian Date at the midpoint of the observation.

Column.Name: xPos
Column.Description: PSF x center location.

Column.Name: yPos
Column.Description: PSF y center location.

Column.Name: xPosErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF x center location.

Column.Name: yPosErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF y center location.

Column.Name: pltScale
Column.Description: Local plate scale at this location.

Column.Name: posAngle
Column.Description: Position angle (sky-to-chip) at this location.

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: Right ascension.

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: Declination.

Column.Name: raErr
Column.Description: Right ascension error.

Column.Name: decErr
Column.Description: Declination error.

Column.Name: extNSigma
Column.Description: An extendedness measure based on the deviation between PSF and Kron (1980) magnitudes, normalized by the PSF magnitude uncertainty.

Column.Name: zp
Column.Description: Photometric zeropoint. Necessary for converting listed fluxes and magnitudes back to measured ADU counts.

Column.Name: telluricExt
Column.Description: Estimated Telluric extinction due to non-photometric observing conditions. Necessary for converting listed fluxes and magnitudes back to measured ADU counts.

Column.Name: expTime
Column.Description: Exposure time of the frame/exposure. Necessary for converting listed fluxes and magnitudes back to measured ADU counts.

Column.Name: airMass
Column.Description: Airmass at midpoint of the exposure. Necessary for converting listed fluxes and magnitudes back to measured ADU counts.

Column.Name: psfFlux
Column.Description: Flux from PSF fit.

Column.Name: psfFluxErr
Column.Description: Error on flux from PSF fit.

Column.Name: psfMajorFWHM
Column.Description: PSF major axis FWHM.

Column.Name: psfMinorFWHM
Column.Description: PSF minor axis FWHM.

Column.Name: psfTheta
Column.Description: PSF major axis orientation.

Column.Name: psfCore
Column.Description: PSF core parameter k, where F = F0 / (1 + k r^2 + r^3.33).

Column.Name: psfQf
Column.Description: PSF coverage factor.

Column.Name: psfQfPerfect
Column.Description: PSF weighted fraction of pixels totally unmasked.

Column.Name: psfChiSq
Column.Description: Reduced chi squared value of the PSF model fit.

Column.Name: psfLikelihood
Column.Description: Likelihood that this detection is best fit by a PSF.

Column.Name: momentXX
Column.Description: Second moment M_xx.

Column.Name: momentXY
Column.Description: Second moment M_xy.

Column.Name: momentYY
Column.Description: Second moment M_yy.

Column.Name: momentR1
Column.Description: First radial moment.

Column.Name: momentRH
Column.Description: Half radial moment (r^0.5 weighting).

Column.Name: momentM3C
Column.Description: Cosine of trefoil second moment term: r^2 cos(3 theta) = M_xxx - 3 * M_xyy.

Column.Name: momentM3S
Column.Description: Sine of trefoil second moment: r^2 sin (3 theta) = 3 * M_xxy - M_yyy.

Column.Name: momentM4C
Column.Description: Cosine of quadrupole second moment: r^2 cos (4 theta) = M_xxxx - 6 * M_xxyy + M_yyyy.

Column.Name: momentM4S
Column.Description: Sine of quadrupole second moment: r^2 sin (4 theta) = 4 * M_xxxy - 4 * M_xyyy.

Column.Name: apFlux
Column.Description: Flux in seeing-dependent aperture.

Column.Name: apFluxErr
Column.Description: Error on flux in seeing-dependent aperture.

Column.Name: apFillF
Column.Description: Aperture fill factor.

Column.Name: apRadius
Column.Description: Aperture radius.

Column.Name: kronFlux
Column.Description: Kron (1980) flux.

Column.Name: kronFluxErr
Column.Description: Error on Kron (1980) flux.

Column.Name: kronRad
Column.Description: Kron (1980) radius.

Column.Name: sky
Column.Description: Background sky level.

Column.Name: skyErr
Column.Description: Error in background sky level.

Column.Name: infoFlag
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask indicating details of the photometry. Values listed in DetectionFlags.

Column.Name: infoFlag2
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask indicating details of the photometry. Values listed in DetectionFlags2.

Column.Name: infoFlag3
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask indicating details of the photometry. Values listed in DetectionFlags3.

Column.Name: processingVersion
Column.Description: Data release version.

Table.Name: MeanObject
Table.Description: Contains the mean photometric information for objects based on the single epoch data

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Unique object identifier.

Column.Name: uniquePspsOBid
Column.Description: Unique internal PSPS object identifier.

Column.Name: gQfPerfect
Column.Description: Maximum PSF weighted fraction of pixels totally unmasked from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanPSFMag
Column.Description: Mean PSF magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanPSFMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean PSF magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanPSFMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of PSF magnitudes from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanPSFMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean PSF magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanPSFMagMin
Column.Description: Minimum PSF magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanPSFMagMax
Column.Description: Maximum PSF magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanKronMag
Column.Description: Mean Kron (1980) magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanKronMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean Kron (1980) magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanKronMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of Kron (1980) magnitudes from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanKronMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean Kron (1980) magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanApMag
Column.Description: Mean aperture magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanApMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean aperture magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanApMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of aperture magnitudes from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gMeanApMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean aperture magnitude from g filter detections.

Column.Name: gFlags
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask for mean object from g filter detections. Values listed in ObjectFilterFlags.

Column.Name: rQfPerfect
Column.Description: Maximum PSF weighted fraction of pixels totally unmasked from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanPSFMag
Column.Description: Mean PSF magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanPSFMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean PSF magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanPSFMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of PSF magnitudes from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanPSFMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean PSF magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanPSFMagMin
Column.Description: Minimum PSF magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanPSFMagMax
Column.Description: Maximum PSF magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanKronMag
Column.Description: Mean Kron (1980) magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanKronMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean Kron (1980) magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanKronMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of Kron (1980) magnitudes from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanKronMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean Kron (1980) magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanApMag
Column.Description: Mean aperture magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanApMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean aperture magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanApMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of aperture magnitudes from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rMeanApMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean aperture magnitude from r filter detections.

Column.Name: rFlags
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask for mean object from r filter detections. Values listed in ObjectFilterFlags.

Column.Name: iQfPerfect
Column.Description: Maximum PSF weighted fraction of pixels totally unmasked from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanPSFMag
Column.Description: Mean PSF magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanPSFMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean PSF magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanPSFMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of PSF magnitudes from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanPSFMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean PSF magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanPSFMagMin
Column.Description: Minimum PSF magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanPSFMagMax
Column.Description: Maximum PSF magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanKronMag
Column.Description: Mean Kron (1980) magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanKronMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean Kron (1980) magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanKronMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of Kron (1980) magnitudes from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanKronMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean Kron (1980) magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanApMag
Column.Description: Mean aperture magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanApMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean aperture magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanApMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of aperture magnitudes from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iMeanApMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean aperture magnitude from i filter detections.

Column.Name: iFlags
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask for mean object from i filter detections. Values listed in ObjectFilterFlags.

Column.Name: zQfPerfect
Column.Description: Maximum PSF weighted fraction of pixels totally unmasked from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanPSFMag
Column.Description: Mean PSF magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanPSFMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean PSF magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanPSFMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of PSF magnitudes from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanPSFMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean PSF magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanPSFMagMin
Column.Description: Minimum PSF magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanPSFMagMax
Column.Description: Maximum PSF magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanKronMag
Column.Description: Mean Kron (1980) magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanKronMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean Kron (1980) magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanKronMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of Kron (1980) magnitudes from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanKronMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean Kron (1980) magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanApMag
Column.Description: Mean aperture magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanApMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean aperture magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanApMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of aperture magnitudes from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zMeanApMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean aperture magnitude from z filter detections.

Column.Name: zFlags
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask for mean object from z filter detections. Values listed in ObjectFilterFlags.

Column.Name: yQfPerfect
Column.Description: Maximum PSF weighted fraction of pixels totally unmasked from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanPSFMag
Column.Description: Mean PSF magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanPSFMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean PSF magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanPSFMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of PSF magnitudes from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanPSFMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean PSF magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanPSFMagMin
Column.Description: Minimum PSF magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanPSFMagMax
Column.Description: Maximum PSF magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanKronMag
Column.Description: Mean Kron (1980) magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanKronMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean Kron (1980) magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanKronMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of Kron (1980) magnitudes from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanKronMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean Kron (1980) magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanApMag
Column.Description: Mean aperture magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanApMagErr
Column.Description: Error in mean aperture magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanApMagStd
Column.Description: Standard deviation of aperture magnitudes from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yMeanApMagNpt
Column.Description: Number of measurements included in mean aperture magnitude from y filter detections.

Column.Name: yFlags
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask for mean object from y filter detections. Values listed in ObjectFilterFlags.

Table.Name: ObjectThin
Table.Description: Contains the positional information for objects in a number of coordinate systems

Column.Name: objName
Column.Description: IAU name for this object.

Column.Name: objNameHMS
Column.Description: Alternate Pan-STARRS name for this object.

Column.Name: objAltName1
Column.Description: Alternate name for this object.

Column.Name: objAltName2
Column.Description: Altername name for this object.

Column.Name: objAltName3
Column.Description: Altername name for this object.

Column.Name: objPopularName
Column.Description: Well known name for this object.

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Unique object identifier.

Column.Name: uniquePspsOBid
Column.Description: Unique internal PSPS object identifier.

Column.Name: ippObjID
Column.Description: IPP internal object identifier.

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: Survey identifier. Details in the Survey table.

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical triangular mesh (Szalay 2007) index.

Column.Name: zoneID
Column.Description: Local zone index, found by dividing the sky into bands of declination 1/2 arcminute in height: zoneID = floor((90 + declination)/0.0083333).

Column.Name: tessID
Column.Description: Tessellation identifier. Details in the TessellationType table.

Column.Name: projectionID
Column.Description: Projection cell identifier.

Column.Name: skyCellID
Column.Description: Skycell region identifier.

Column.Name: randomID
Column.Description: Random value drawn from the interval between zero and one.

Column.Name: batchID
Column.Description: Internal database batch identifier.

Column.Name: dvoRegionID
Column.Description: Internal DVO region identifier.

Column.Name: processingVersion
Column.Description: Data release version.

Column.Name: objInfoFlag
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask indicating details of the photometry. Values listed in ObjectInfoFlags

Column.Name: qualityFlag
Column.Description: Subset of objInfoFlag denoting whether this object is real or a likely false positive. Values listed in ObjectQualityFlags

Column.Name: raStack
Column.Description: Right ascension from stack detections, weighted mean value across filters, in equinox J2000. See StackObjectThin for stack epoch information.

Column.Name: decStack
Column.Description: Declination from stack detections, weighted mean value across filters, in equinox J2000. See StackObjectThin for stack epoch information.

Column.Name: raStackErr
Column.Description: Right ascension standard deviation from stack detections.

Column.Name: decStackErr
Column.Description: Declination standard deviation from stack detections.

Column.Name: raMean
Column.Description: Right ascension from single epoch detections (weighted mean) in equinox J2000 at the mean epoch given by epochMean.

Column.Name: decMean
Column.Description: Declination from single epoch detections (weighted mean) in equinox J2000 at the mean epoch given by epochMean.

Column.Name: raMeanErr
Column.Description: Right ascension standard deviation from single epoch detections.

Column.Name: decMeanErr
Column.Description: Declination standard deviation from single epoch detections.

Column.Name: epochMean
Column.Description: Modified Julian Date of the mean epoch corresponding to raMean, decMean (equinox J2000). Note that Gaia DR1 data is sometimes included in the mean position; in those cases, the epochMean value is near the Gaia DR1 epoch 2015.5 = MJD 15023. As a result, epochMean is not necessarily near the mean value of the PS1 measurement dates.

Column.Name: posMeanChisq
Column.Description: Reduced chi squared value of mean position.

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: Cartesian x on a unit sphere.

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: Cartesian y on a unit sphere.

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: Cartesian z on a unit sphere.

Column.Name: lambda
Column.Description: Ecliptic longitude.

Column.Name: beta
Column.Description: Ecliptic latitude.

Column.Name: l
Column.Description: Galactic longitude.

Column.Name: b
Column.Description: Galactic latitude.

Column.Name: nStackObjectRows
Column.Description: Number of independent StackObjectThin rows associated with this object.

Column.Name: nStackDetections
Column.Description: Number of stack detections.

Column.Name: nDetections
Column.Description: Number of single epoch detections in all filters.

Column.Name: ng
Column.Description: Number of single epoch detections in g filter.

Column.Name: nr
Column.Description: Number of single epoch detections in r filter.

Column.Name: ni
Column.Description: Number of single epoch detections in i filter.

Column.Name: nz
Column.Description: Number of single epoch detections in z filter.

Column.Name: ny
Column.Description: Number of single epoch detections in y filter.

Table.Name: stackObjectAttributes
Table.Description: Contains the PSF, Kron (1980), and aperture fluxes for all filters in a single row, along with point-source object shape parameters

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Unique object identifier.

Column.Name: uniquePspsSTid
Column.Description: Unique internal PSPS stack identifier.

Column.Name: ippObjID
Column.Description: IPP internal object identifier.

Column.Name: randomStackObjID
Column.Description: Random value drawn from the interval between zero and one.

Column.Name: primaryDetection
Column.Description: Identifies if this row is the primary stack detection.

Column.Name: bestDetection
Column.Description: Identifies if this row is the best detection.

Column.Name: gippDetectID
Column.Description: IPP internal detection identifier.

Column.Name: gstackDetectID
Column.Description: Unique stack detection identifier.

Column.Name: gstackImageID
Column.Description: Unique stack identifier for g filter detection.

Column.Name: gxPos
Column.Description: PSF x center location from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gyPos
Column.Description: PSF y center location from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gxPosErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF x center location from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gyPosErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF y center location from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gpsfMajorFWHM
Column.Description: PSF major axis FWHM from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gpsfMinorFWHM
Column.Description: PSF minor axis FWHM from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gpsfTheta
Column.Description: PSF major axis orientation from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gpsfCore
Column.Description: PSF core parameter k from g filter stack detection, where F = F0 / (1 + k r^2 + r^3.33).

Column.Name: gpsfLikelihood
Column.Description: Likelihood that this g filter stack detection is best fit by a PSF.

Column.Name: gpsfQf
Column.Description: PSF coverage factor for g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gpsfQfPerfect
Column.Description: PSF-weighted fraction of pixels totally unmasked for g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gpsfChiSq
Column.Description: Reduced chi squared value of the PSF model fit for g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gmomentXX
Column.Description: Second moment M_xx for g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gmomentXY
Column.Description: Second moment M_xy for g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gmomentYY
Column.Description: Second moment M_yy for g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gmomentR1
Column.Description: First radial moment for g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gmomentRH
Column.Description: Half radial moment (r^0.5 weighting) for g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gPSFFlux
Column.Description: PSF flux from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gPSFFluxErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF flux from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gApFlux
Column.Description: Aperture flux from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gApFluxErr
Column.Description: Error in aperture flux from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gApFillFac
Column.Description: Aperture fill factor from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gApRadius
Column.Description: Aperture radius for g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gKronFlux
Column.Description: Kron (1980) flux from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gKronFluxErr
Column.Description: Error in Kron (1980) flux from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gKronRad
Column.Description: Kron (1980) radius from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gexpTime
Column.Description: Exposure time of the g filter stack. Necessary for converting listed fluxes and magnitudes back to measured ADU counts.

Column.Name: gExtNSigma
Column.Description: An extendedness measure for the g filter stack detection based on the deviation between PSF and Kron (1980) magnitudes, normalized by the PSF magnitude uncertainty.

Column.Name: gsky
Column.Description: Residual background sky level at the g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gskyErr
Column.Description: Error in residual background sky level at the g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gzp
Column.Description: Photometric zeropoint for the g filter stack. Necessary for converting listed fluxes and magnitudes back to measured ADU counts.

Column.Name: gPlateScale
Column.Description: Local plate scale for the g filter stack.

Column.Name: rippDetectID
Column.Description: IPP internal detection identifier.

Column.Name: rstackDetectID
Column.Description: Unique stack detection identifier.

Column.Name: rstackImageID
Column.Description: Unique stack identifier for r filter detection.

Column.Name: rxPos
Column.Description: PSF x center location from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: ryPos
Column.Description: PSF y center location from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rxPosErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF x center location from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: ryPosErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF y center location from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rpsfMajorFWHM
Column.Description: PSF major axis FWHM from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rpsfMinorFWHM
Column.Description: PSF minor axis FWHM from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rpsfTheta
Column.Description: PSF major axis orientation from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rpsfCore
Column.Description: PSF core parameter k from r filter stack detection, where F = F0 / (1 + k r^2 + r^3.33).

Column.Name: rpsfLikelihood
Column.Description: Likelihood that this r filter stack detection is best fit by a PSF.

Column.Name: rpsfQf
Column.Description: PSF coverage factor for r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rpsfQfPerfect
Column.Description: PSF-weighted fraction of pixels totally unmasked for r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rpsfChiSq
Column.Description: Reduced chi squared value of the PSF model fit for r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rmomentXX
Column.Description: Second moment M_xx for r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rmomentXY
Column.Description: Second moment M_xy for r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rmomentYY
Column.Description: Second moment M_yy for r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rmomentR1
Column.Description: First radial moment for r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rmomentRH
Column.Description: Half radial moment (r^0.5 weighting) for r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rPSFFlux
Column.Description: PSF flux from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rPSFFluxErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF flux from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rApFlux
Column.Description: Aperture flux from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rApFluxErr
Column.Description: Error in aperture flux from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rApFillFac
Column.Description: Aperture fill factor from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rApRadius
Column.Description: Aperture radius for r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rKronFlux
Column.Description: Kron (1980) flux from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rKronFluxErr
Column.Description: Error in Kron (1980) flux from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rKronRad
Column.Description: Kron (1980) radius from r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rexpTime
Column.Description: Exposure time of the r filter stack. Necessary for converting listed fluxes and magnitudes back to measured ADU counts.

Column.Name: rExtNSigma
Column.Description: An extendedness measure for the r filter stack detection based on the deviation between PSF and Kron (1980) magnitudes, normalized by the PSF magnitude uncertainty.

Column.Name: rsky
Column.Description: Residual background sky level at the r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rskyErr
Column.Description: Error in residual background sky level at the r filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rzp
Column.Description: Photometric zeropoint for the r filter stack. Necessary for converting listed fluxes and magnitudes back to measured ADU counts.

Column.Name: rPlateScale
Column.Description: Local plate scale for the r filter stack.

Column.Name: iippDetectID
Column.Description: IPP internal detection identifier.

Column.Name: istackDetectID
Column.Description: Unique stack detection identifier.

Column.Name: istackImageID
Column.Description: Unique stack identifier for i filter detection.

Column.Name: ixPos
Column.Description: PSF x center location from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iyPos
Column.Description: PSF y center location from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: ixPosErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF x center location from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iyPosErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF y center location from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: ipsfMajorFWHM
Column.Description: PSF major axis FWHM from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: ipsfMinorFWHM
Column.Description: PSF minor axis FWHM from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: ipsfTheta
Column.Description: PSF major axis orientation from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: ipsfCore
Column.Description: PSF core parameter k from i filter stack detection, where F = F0 / (1 + k r^2 + r^3.33).

Column.Name: ipsfLikelihood
Column.Description: Likelihood that this i filter stack detection is best fit by a PSF.

Column.Name: ipsfQf
Column.Description: PSF coverage factor for i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: ipsfQfPerfect
Column.Description: PSF-weighted fraction of pixels totally unmasked for i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: ipsfChiSq
Column.Description: Reduced chi squared value of the PSF model fit for i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: imomentXX
Column.Description: Second moment M_xx for i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: imomentXY
Column.Description: Second moment M_xy for i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: imomentYY
Column.Description: Second moment M_yy for i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: imomentR1
Column.Description: First radial moment for i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: imomentRH
Column.Description: Half radial moment (r^0.5 weighting) for i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iPSFFlux
Column.Description: PSF flux from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iPSFFluxErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF flux from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iApFlux
Column.Description: Aperture flux from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iApFluxErr
Column.Description: Error in aperture flux from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iApFillFac
Column.Description: Aperture fill factor from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iApRadius
Column.Description: Aperture radius for i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iKronFlux
Column.Description: Kron (1980) flux from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iKronFluxErr
Column.Description: Error in Kron (1980) flux from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iKronRad
Column.Description: Kron (1980) radius from i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iexpTime
Column.Description: Exposure time of the i filter stack. Necessary for converting listed fluxes and magnitudes back to measured ADU counts.

Column.Name: iExtNSigma
Column.Description: An extendedness measure for the i filter stack detection based on the deviation between PSF and Kron (1980) magnitudes, normalized by the PSF magnitude uncertainty.

Column.Name: isky
Column.Description: Residual background sky level at the i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: iskyErr
Column.Description: Error in residual background sky level at the i filter stack detection.

Column.Name: izp
Column.Description: Photometric zeropoint for the i filter stack. Necessary for converting listed fluxes and magnitudes back to measured ADU counts.

Column.Name: iPlateScale
Column.Description: Local plate scale for the i filter stack.

Column.Name: zippDetectID
Column.Description: IPP internal detection identifier.

Column.Name: zstackDetectID
Column.Description: Unique stack detection identifier.

Column.Name: zstackImageID
Column.Description: Unique stack identifier for z filter detection.

Column.Name: zxPos
Column.Description: PSF x center location from z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zyPos
Column.Description: PSF y center location from z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zxPosErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF x center location from z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zyPosErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF y center location from z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zpsfMajorFWHM
Column.Description: PSF major axis FWHM from z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zpsfMinorFWHM
Column.Description: PSF minor axis FWHM from z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zpsfTheta
Column.Description: PSF major axis orientation from z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zpsfCore
Column.Description: PSF core parameter k from z filter stack detection, where F = F0 / (1 + k r^2 + r^3.33).

Column.Name: zpsfLikelihood
Column.Description: Likelihood that this z filter stack detection is best fit by a PSF.

Column.Name: zpsfQf
Column.Description: PSF coverage factor for z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zpsfQfPerfect
Column.Description: PSF-weighted fraction of pixels totally unmasked for z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zpsfChiSq
Column.Description: Reduced chi squared value of the PSF model fit for z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zmomentXX
Column.Description: Second moment M_xx for z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zmomentXY
Column.Description: Second moment M_xy for z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zmomentYY
Column.Description: Second moment M_yy for z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zmomentR1
Column.Description: First radial moment for z filter stack detection.

Column.Name: zmomentRH
Column.Description: Half radial moment (r^0.5 weighting) for z filter stack detection.

Column.Description: An extendedness measure for the z filter stack detection based on the deviation between PSF and Kron (1980) magnitudes, normalized by the PSF magnitude uncertainty.

Table.Name: stackObjectThin
Table.Description: Contains the positional and photometric information for point-source photometry of stack detections

Column.Name: objID
Column.Description: Unique object identifier.

Column.Name: uniquePspsSTid
Column.Description: Unique internal PSPS stack identifier.

Column.Name: ippObjID
Column.Description: IPP internal object identifier.

Column.Name: surveyID
Column.Description: Survey identifier. Details in the Survey table.

Column.Name: tessID
Column.Description: Tessellation identifier. Details in the TessellationType table.

Column.Name: projectionID
Column.Description: Projection cell identifier.

Column.Name: skyCellID
Column.Description: Skycell region identifier.

Column.Name: randomStackObjID
Column.Description: Random value drawn from the interval between zero and one.

Column.Name: primaryDetection
Column.Description: Identifies if this row is the primary stack detection.

Column.Name: bestDetection
Column.Description: Identifies if this row is the best detection.

Column.Name: dvoRegionID
Column.Description: Internal DVO region identifier.

Column.Name: processingVersion
Column.Description: Data release version.

Column.Name: gippDetectID
Column.Description: IPP internal detection identifier.

Column.Name: gstackDetectID
Column.Description: Unique stack detection identifier.

Column.Name: gstackImageID
Column.Description: Unique stack identifier for g filter detection.

Column.Name: gra
Column.Description: Right ascension from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gdec
Column.Description: Declination from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: graErr
Column.Description: Right ascension error from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gdecErr
Column.Description: Declination error from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gEpoch
Column.Description: Modified Julian Date of the mean epoch of images contributing to the the g-band stack (equinox J2000).

Column.Name: gPSFMag
Column.Description: PSF magnitude from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gPSFMagErr
Column.Description: Error in PSF magnitude from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gApMag
Column.Description: Aperture magnitude from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gApMagErr
Column.Description: Error in aperture magnitude from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gKronMag
Column.Description: Kron (1980) magnitude from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: gKronMagErr
Column.Description: Error in Kron (1980) magnitude from g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: ginfoFlag
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask indicating details of the g filter stack photometry. Values listed in DetectionFlags.

Column.Name: ginfoFlag2
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask indicating details of the g filter stack photometry. Values listed in DetectionFlags2.

Column.Name: ginfoFlag3
Column.Description: Information flag bitmask indicating details of the g filter stack photometry. Values listed in DetectionFlags3.

Column.Name: gnFrames
Column.Description: Number of input frames/exposures contributing to the g filter stack detection.

Column.Name: rippDetectID
Column.Description: IPP internal detection identifier.

Column.Description: Unique stack detection identifier.

Column.Name: rstackImageID
